website_summaries.verdict: Lots of pieces, interesting figures, and an imagination-invoking theme makes this affordable Roblox set an engaging toy.
pros: Includes musical instruments like guitars and drums
Accessories are interchangeable so youngsters can customize the band
cons: Rare reports of pieces not staying put when attached, but many more happy customers love this popular set

customer_reviews.title: One way to get the video game nuts away from their computers.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are Robloxians to the max, and they approve of these toys. So do I, actually, because they're fun and well made.
customer_reviews.author: CapnCaveman

customer_reviews.title: 6 year olds give vague list. Roblox comes through!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly had no idea what this was. I bought them for my 6 year olds birthday on the 26th. And him being nearly six gave very vague details of what he wanted. He wanted a guitar guy and a surfer guy... right? Also on his list was Roblox. The first thing that popped up when looking at Roblox was a band complete with "guitar guy" and a surfer and soccer person. I was very happy to find them and he will enjoy them once his birthday rolls around.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Roblox Punk Rockers
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my 8 year old grandson and according to him, they are "awesome". Fairly sturdy for kids to play with and not break and they are really cute. My grandson loved them so what better review can I write than what he said about them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday topper!
customer_reviews.text: We used these as cake toppers for our friends 30th birthday. It was incredible! The prices click I to each other. The accessories are pretty secure.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Shope

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed the package come all bad it was for a present how can I give something like that ?? I get it the product is not damage but it’s a present and the box make it look bad
customer_reviews.author: ESPERANZA A FIGUEROA

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love these toys
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the roblox toys especially if the family loves music ... encourages imaginative, interactive play.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Good for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them. Although I think these things are overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Chopin

customer_reviews.title: Cool set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter, who loves Roblox. She really liked the punk rockers. Their hair and clothes and instruments are interchangeable, so she continues to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: bezanator

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! My husband and son are in a band, got this for them
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great the kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great set. These individual packages give you extra items you don’t get with mystery boxes
customer_reviews.author: Pimpers83

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's Roblox! Of course my son is over the moon happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: my grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Items as described, arrived on time and no problem with the order.. my grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool set
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift for a child and he seems to have really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Good product, came. From warehouse and seemed to be in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift😌🎄🎁
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for! My son is going to love these!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great little punkers for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about Roblox other than my daughter is obsessed with them and she plays them on every device in the house. Great little punkers for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Mashunkashey

customer_reviews.title: I got RIPPED OFF
customer_reviews.text: It's a scam. I did not get a code or any way to use the points I purchased. 25.00 down the drain. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennchad

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: My grandson opened and yelled "cool" and ran off to his room to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Colescott

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and priced better than the toy stores. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Roblox and he was so excited to get this set!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Buyyy
customer_reviews.text: My younger brother will love it. Great condition and super cool
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti

customer_reviews.title: Roblox Punk Rockers Mix & Match Set
customer_reviews.text: Roblox Punk Rockers Mix & Match Set Love this set
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item was sent
customer_reviews.text: Instead of Punk Rockers, I've received Robot Riot. It was a birthday gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: tarkanakas

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: If your keys collect roblox this is a good set to get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the 8 year old grandson wanted.
customer_reviews.text: He was happy. Not sure how to review these because they are just little figures, but as long as he has fun with them!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Happy kid!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it and it is worth the price compared to most robotic toys. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bigskylady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set. My eight year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loves them and plays with them all the time. They look just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: tamu bowrey

customer_reviews.title: One of the favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most fun sets from Roblox. The set even comes with a cardboard background that you can set it up like they are on a stage performing. My grandson loves this. He plays with the Roblox and Minecraft together. Lots of imagination.
customer_reviews.author: P. Manogg

customer_reviews.title: Lots of small pieces- 3 and up is best.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this for his birthday! And he loved it! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Alice

product_meta.title: Roblox Action Collection - Punk Rockers Four Figure Pack [Includes Exclusive Virtual Item]
product_meta.description: Get ready for the ultimate blox-and-roll concert! Pick up your favorite guitar and crank your amp up to eleven, because it’s time to melt some noob faces. Mix-and-match the instruments and fun hairstyles to turn these punk rockers into legends. Then, create new band members by adding in other parts from your entire Roblox toy collection. Includes: 4 figures, Acessories, Collector's Checklist, and an Exclusive Virtual Code.
feature_bullets: The Roblox Punk Rockers Mix & Match Set includes four figures with interchangeable parts and loads of accessories compatible with other characters in your collection
Mix and match parts to build your own unique Roblox character
Deck out your figures with the included accessories
Each package comes with a redeemable code to unlock an exclusive virtual item on Roblox
Collect all your favorite Roblox figures today

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars291 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
